level.heading: DELEGABLE AND NON-DELEGABLE POWERS OF THE OFFICE OF ADJUDICATION (ยง 16-1528)

level.text: Except as noted in ยง1528.2, all functions of the Office of Adjudication are to be performed personally by the Administrative Law Judge (ALJ). The following powers shall be nondelegable:
Rendering final decisions in a case.
The staff of the Office of Adjudication may perform the following functions:
Maintain the calendar for the Office of Adjudication;
Perform internal administrative functions of the Office of Adjudication;
Contact the parties when necessary concerning changes in schedules; and
Exercise any other powers or duties delegated by the ALJ.
